mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spec (companyName, toeic, toefl, teps, opic, tos, internship, degree, score, id) VALUES(#{companyName},#{toeic},#{toefl}, #{teps},#{opic},#{tos},#{internship},#{degree},#{score}, #{id})
mapper.update: UPDATE spec SET companyName=#{spec.companyName}, toeic=#{spec.toeic}, toefl=#{spec.toefl}, teps=#{spec.teps}, opic=#{spec.opic}, tos=#{spec.tos}, internship=#{spec.internship}, degree=#{spec.degree}, score=#{spec.score} WHERE ID=#{ID}
